valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 5 Oct 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 6 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: Low North Utsire 970 expected Baltic sea 1001 by 0600 tomorrow. High west of FitzRoy 1030 expected Biscay 1029 by same time

FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In south, northeasterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 in east, becoming variable 2 to 4 later in south. In north, northwesterly 3 to 5, becoming variable 2 to 4, then southwesterly 4 to 6 later in west.
Sea state
In south, rough. in north, moderate or rough.
Weather
In south, fair. In north, fair.
Visibility
In south, good. In north, good.
